text: Add the ability to have image dropdowns for choices in `choice` field selector. Would help with illustrating layout options for when using this field type in a CM for that.

<@U2H3TT8F2> I use emoji _“because I’m told I’m supposed to be into that”_. See my talk in “from simple to mind blowing: A Technical Walkthrough of How Our V2 Custom Modules Are Changing the HubSpot CMS and how to write other really long titles” <https://designers.HubSpot.com/blog/developer-day-2018-videos>

lol im all for using that to illustrate some things, but for my use case its something like:
What kind of style do you want
two tone, one line, one line with a logo
for the first two, def, the one line with logo, not so much
true, not great for every scenario
ok, adding it here since it isn't in blog settings: a way to bulk publish/unpublished the entire blog. if you're curious for a use case, check out the general channel...
:bulb: If possible: have dynamic pages populate inside of the Page Field inside of Custom Modules.
